description: This file defines a Java record named ApiError used for representing standard error responses in a flight status service API. It includes fields such as timestamp, status code, error message, message details, request path, and a list of field violations. It also contains an inner record 'FieldViolation' to specify validation errors on specific fields.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: A record representing a standardized error response for the API, encapsulating details about the error including timestamp, status, error message, request path, and field-level violations.

classes.name: ApiError.FieldViolation
classes.description: An inner record within ApiError that specifies validation failures on individual fields by storing the field name and associated error message.
